verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w What|strong="H6963"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* believe \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H6963"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.’”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* asked \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, “\w What|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?” “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3068"\w* replied.

“\w Throw|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w threw|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w snake|strong="H5175"\w*,\f + \fr 4:3 \ft Hebrew nachash, in contrast to Aaron’s staff, which became a tannin in Exodus 7:10\f* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w ran|strong="H5127"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*.

“\w Stretch|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w grab|strong="H2388"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*,” \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w reached|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w caught|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* snake, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* back \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

“\w This|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* believe \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers—\w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Abraham, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*—\w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.” Moses’ Hand

\w Furthermore|strong="H5750"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w Put|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w inside|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* cloak.\f + \fr 4:6 \ft Hebrew into your bosom; twice in this verse and twice in verse 7\f*” \w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w inside|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* cloak, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w*,\f + \fr 4:6 \ft The Hebrew word traditionally translated as leprous was used for various skin diseases; see Leviticus 13.\f* white \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*.

“\w Put|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w inside|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* cloak,” \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3318"\w* \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w inside|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* cloak, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w*, \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* rest \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w skin|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* believe \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w heed|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w witness|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* sign, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* believe \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* second.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* believe \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* signs \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \w ground|strong="H3004"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w ground|strong="H3004"\w*.” The Appointment of Aaron

“Please, \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,” \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w eloquent|strong="H1697"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w past|strong="H8032"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w slow|strong="H3515"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w speech|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w*, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w gave|strong="H7760"\w* \w man|strong="H2795"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*? \w Or|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w makes|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mute \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sighted \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*? \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*! \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w help|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w what|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*.”
But Moses replied, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w*, Lord, \w send|strong="H7971"\w* someone \w else|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* anger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* brother? \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H7125"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*. \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w help|strong="H1961"\w* \w both|strong="H3384"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w spokesman|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* God \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* signs \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*.” Moses Leaves for Egypt

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* \f + \fr 4:18 \ft Moses’ father-in-law Jethro was also called Reuel; see Exodus 2:18.\f* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* brothers \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H7965"\w* \w are|strong="H4714"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*.” “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*,” \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* replied.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* wife \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* headed \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* instructed \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w within|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w harden|strong="H2388"\w* \f + \fr 4:21 \ft Or stiffen or strengthen\f* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* tell \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* told \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w My|strong="H7971"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w worship|strong="H5647"\w* \w Me|strong="H7971"\w*. \w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w since|strong="H2009"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*!’”

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lodging|strong="H4411"\w* \w place|strong="H4411"\w* along \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w met|strong="H6298"\w* Moses \f + \fr 4:24 \ft Hebrew him\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Zipporah|strong="H6855"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flint|strong="H6864"\w* knife, \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w foreskin|strong="H6190"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3588"\w*’ \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.\f + \fr 4:25 \ft Hebrew his feet\f* “\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*,” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* said.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7503"\w* \w him|strong="H7503"\w* \w alone|strong="H7503"\w*.
